title: SB 1.18.31 | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | 19-04-2023 | Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: ओम अज्ञानति मिरान्दस्य ज्ञानां जनिशलाकया चक्षिरुन्वीलितं येनातस्मै श्री गुरवे नमः

इस गुर्मे में बहुत पूरा विशेषक नहीं खुद है और उस विशेषजों के पास को कर दे नहीं जा रही था
इसलिए निकले बगोबय की कुछ नहीं लगा उसके लिए एक जुड़ा बॉब पर ने के पास अपनी स्तर दिया।
पर क्योंकि उसे क्या नहीं कोई व रंटने यहां से पहुच रहा गया था।
पतंच्या नहीं खुशी लाने के लिए फर्ट अपने परेश्चों के अकेमे असना शुरू करंग और वह थक्की करँटियाया।
उनकी सबसे बहुत रखकर बनाया और आपको जो बनाने के बाद बचन अगर यही करते हैं।
वो उसके से अक्रेमेंट शेयर कर ले और अध्यक्षत भी शेयर कर लेता।
क्योंकि वो बहुत का प्रतिंतित दुश्यों में है।
रेपार एक रेपार शुरू करती है।
कि अगर जो वहीं आज है, तो वह नहीं होगा।
परिक्षित्र अपने अपना शिर्म के बारे में अपने अदर्भाग कर सकती है,
क्योंकि वह रेपार खुद है, वह बहुत-बहुत बढ़कर साथ है किर्चा दोंगकर।
लेकिन इस बात को एक बुरा घर से आकरने है उससे सब प्रति बचरना थे
और उसको पता गया थी, कि वह आपको अदेश जरूर मेडितेशन कर रही था
या कि वो मैंने प्रति का रखना चाहिए है
और इसलिए, उम्मीद कर दो कि मैं आगा जा रहा हूँ
हमें निक्ल परिएश करेंगे। क्षम एक क baseline के तरीके से हम इसे करते हैं।

उनकी अरेष्टिगी में पैटन करके, एक अरेषटिगी में पैटन करके, वही होता है।
दुर्धवान सवा है।

किसी प्रेथर लोग में नहीं हैं लेकिन फिर रभा नहींम ने असल इसी ःक्तः रोमंति जल्ड marathon का 100 देखोगा .

उसका प्रति कार्म का ज्ञान नहीं जाता है कि शुरू के पास जीनों के लिए ये शुरू कर जाते हैं.
दुदारी के दिखाओं के बाद जिसके साथ लोग बाद पास बना जा दूँ.
तो यह अचारियों के एनालिसिस है। दो अचारियों के पाठवित्रभु, श्री लविश्वनात चेकरवर्टी थाकु और श्रील जीव रोजवार्ण.
अगर श्रील विश्वनात चेकरवर्टी के बारे में एक प्लान लगा था, और उनका प्रभुष बना जाए।
The plan was that for his so-called misdeed, the king could be cursed by an inexperienced
Brahmana boy infected by the influence of Kali and thus the king would leave his heart and
hope for good.
His connections with Srila Shukadeva Goswami would enable the presentation of the great
Srimad Bhagavatam which is considered to be the book incarnation of the Lord.
See how Srila Vishwanacharya Dronika was analyzing this entire incident.
It is a fact that Pariksit Maharaj was the right candidate to make inquiries and thereby
Shukadeva Goswami would speak.

Pariksit received Shukadeva Goswami nicely and began to

Prabhupada says this book incarnation of the Lord gives much

of the activities of the Supreme Lord Krishna
the incarnation of Lord Krishna and particularly those activities

What is significance? Because anyone who properly learns about
this particular pastime of the Lord will certainly be dissuaded
from mundane sex desire. See if you hear properly about this
Leela from the right source then your mundane sex desire is
completely destroyed and such a
hearer will be placed on the path of sublime devotional service to

God. The pure devotee's mundane frustration is meant to elevate
the devotee to a higher transcendental position. Apparently Parikshit

by the Lord that his devotee becomes an instrument for Bhagavatam
to prosper. Now Prabhupada gives another example of this.
By placing Arjuna and the Pandavas in frustration due to the
intrigue of their cousin brothers, the prelude of the Bhagavad
or the battle of Kurukshetra was created by the Lord. This was to
incarnate the sound representative of the Lord Bhagavad Gita. See
even Bhagavad Gita Krishna spoke on the battlefield of Kurukshetra
just about when the battle is about to begin. Now that is because
Arjuna was put in a position where he had to fight against his
own cousins due to the frustration
by the due to the frustration the Pandavas had to undergo due to
the harassment of this Duryodhana and Pandavas. Unnecessary
harassment. So then war became essential.
They were deprived of their kingdom. But even before fighting
the battle, when all peace negotiations failed, Arjuna being a pure
devotee, he was considering should I fight this battle and kill my
kinsmen simply because we want the kingdom and as a pure devotee
he is not interested in having a big knife and big kingdom.
No.
So Krishna spoke the Bhagavad Gita to actually address the problem
of Arjuna. But that was primarily Krishna only who put Arjuna in
that situation. Sir Krishna could speak through Arjuna to all of us
the Bhagavad Gita. So Brahma says by placing King Pariksit in an awkward
position, the incarnation of Sriman Bhagavatam was created by the will of
the Lord. You see, being distressed by hunger and thirst was only a show
because the King endured much even in the womb of his mother. See the
history of Pariksit is when he was in the womb of his mother, one
Brahmastra was released by Ashwathama to kill that child in the womb.
But Pariksit endured that experience.
Endured that extreme heat of the Brahmastra. And if he could endure so
much of extreme condition, a little thirst while hunting, why he couldn't
endure? That's the argument. The King's distressed condition was certainly
unprecedented. The devotees like Maharaj Pariksit are powerful enough to
forbear self-distress by the will of the Lord.
And they are never disturbed. The situation in this case is therefore all
planned by the Lord. This is the conclusion. So the Acharyas are telling us
that Pariksit was not at all at fault because of an arrangement of the Lord
so that Bhagavatam could be spoken by Shukadeva Swami to Pariksit Maharaj,
Pariksit Maharaj and their relevant inquiries for such a Bhagavad Gita.
